front.name: Magicked
front.desc: A spell or other power is affecting you.
front.rule: Flip to worsen the condition and get a hit. Discard by spending a scene attending to the condition.

back.name: Cursed
back.desc: A powerful and baneful magic has you in its grip.
back.rule: Discard by spending downtime attending to the condition.
